The Binary-Light Document Store for AI-Ready Apps.

Get Started
Quick Start
dotnet add package BLite

using BLite.Core;

var db = new DocumentDb("mydb.blite");
var users = db.GetCollection<User>();
users.Insert(new User { Name = "Alice" });
